title: The Mammoth Book of Zombies
description: Out of the crumbling, stench-filled pit come the undead, the unkillable, the everlasting zombies tracking down the living wherever they hide. Crammed with stories new and old by the masters of the macabre, including Clive Barker, Robert Bloch, Graham Masterston, Ramsey Campbell, Hugh B.
